title: Certificate/Security Error Problem
body:
Does anyone know the reason why I keep having this "**certificate**" error pop-up thing after I log in? I have tried everything to **HOPEFULLY** make it stop. However, none of the things I did work.. **AT ALL**. 

Seriously, what in the name of Noxus is going on? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
This can often be caused by certain settings within Internet Explorer, which the client pulls info from. I suggest working through this guide to resolve this issue. I know [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) states it's for Login issues, but it should also apply to your issue as well.

Let me know if those steps helped.
Thank you so much~! It did help out. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
